Agency Tips for Growing Your Brand and Client Base

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1521815041166{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]You can break down agency growth into three different steps – getting found, getting the meeting, and getting the business. And with the right tools and strategies, it can actually be pretty easy.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”In this issue of Agency Perspectives, you will:” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1517509901734{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]

  • Learn why you should use marketing automation internally for your agency in addition to using it for clients.
  • Discover new strategies for generating awareness, leads and conversions.
  • Get actionable tips for optimizing your lists, workflows, content library and more.

[/vc_column_text]

Marian Temesvary

``B2B sales research shows that 80% or more of the new buyer's journey is passive. In order to catch people's attention, your content should be both prolific and targeted – and marketing automation is the solution to getting prospective clients to go on the journey you want them to take.``

What is Agency Perspectives?
[vc_column_text el_class=”sm-hide”]Agency Perspectives lets you hear directly from other agencies about how they are using marketing automation to create higher value relationships, build monthly recurring revenue, and prove value to clients. It’s available exclusively from SharpSpring. Contact us if you’d like to share your expertise as an author.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text]
